titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to Brazil's informatics policies and supporting the President's action to impose import sanctions against certain products of Brazil in response to such policies.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/19/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the current policies of the Government of Brazil toward the informatics industry impose an unreasonable burden on United States commerce and have become more burdensome since the initiation of an investigation of such policies under the Trade Act of 1974. Supports the action announced by the President to impose sanctions against certain Brazilian products in response to such policies.
